summary: This is an email forwarded on April 19, 2025, containing an external email with the subject 'EPSTEIN INJUSTICE - WE ARE ALL WATCHING YOU'. The email appears to be a threatening message directed at multiple recipients, accusing them of wrongdoing against the sender and other Epstein victims, and demanding redemption. The email was sent from an iPhone.

events.title: Forwarding of Threatening Email
events.description: An email with the subject 'EPSTEIN INJUSTICE - WE ARE ALL WATCHING YOU' is forwarded to a list of recipients. The email contains a threatening message accusing the recipients of wrongdoing against the sender and other Epstein victims.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email dated April 19, 2025, indicating ongoing correspondence related to the Epstein case years after the main events.
The email subject 'EPSTEIN INJUSTICE - WE ARE ALL WATCHING YOU' suggests a threatening tone and public scrutiny directed at the recipients.
The email body contains an accusatory statement: 'YOU WILL ALL GO DOWN FOR WHAT YOU HAVE DONE TO MYSELF AND OTHER EPSTEIN VICTIMS THIS IS YOUR LAST CHANCE FOR REDEMPTION...'

The recipients include legal figures (Sigrid McCawley, Brad Edwards, David Boies), an FBI agent (Jennifer Plotkin), and several other individuals, suggesting the message is aimed at people involved in the legal or investigative aspects of the case.
The email is noted as being sent from an iPhone, and is flagged as an external email, indicating it originated outside the forwarding organization.
